products.title: Style Customizer
products.name: Everest Forms Style Customizer
products.excerpt: Allows you to make design changes without coding. Powerful customizing panel with live preview makes changing colors, fonts, spacing, background, alignment and more an ease.

products.title: MailChimp
products.name: Everest Forms MailChimp
products.excerpt: Allows your users to subscribe to MailChimp via Everest Forms. Users filling up Everest form can be directly added to your subscriber list in MailChimp.

products.title: ConvertKit
products.name: Everest Forms ConvertKit
products.excerpt: Allows you to seamlessly connect Everest form with ConvertKit and capture every detail for every new visitor via your Everest form to collect subscribers.

products.title: PDF Form Submission
products.name: Everest Forms PDF Submission
products.excerpt: Allows you to generate PDF of the data entries submitted by your users via Everest forms and also lets you attach them to emails effortlessly in few clicks.

products.title: PayPal Standard
products.name: Everest Forms PayPal Standard
products.excerpt: Allows you to integrate online payment service to your e-commerce website. You can connect your Everest forms with PayPal to easily collect payments, donations, and online orders.

products.title: Stripe
products.name: Everest Forms Stripe
products.excerpt: Allows you to integrate online payment service to your e-commerce website. You can connect your Everest forms with Stripe to easily collect payments, donations, and online orders.

products.title: Geolocation
products.name: Everest Forms Geolocation
products.excerpt: Allows you to collect precise location of your users and collect data like IP , Country, Postal and zip code along with form submission to provide you an idea of your subscriber map.

products.title: Multi Part Forms
products.name: Everest Forms Multi Part
products.excerpt: Allows you to easily break your long forms into multiple parts. It helps you to make a step wise form instead of one long form which adds rich user experience to your website.

products.title: Custom Captcha
products.name: Everest Forms Custom Captcha
products.excerpt: Allows you to add Custom Questions and Math Captcha to your Everest form for the prevention of spam data entries. It adds a security layer to your website.

products.title: Survey Polls and Quiz
products.name: Everest Forms Survey, Polls and Quiz
products.excerpt: Allows you to create an intuitive survey, poll and quiz forms easily. It provides extra fields like Rating, Likert scale, scale rating along with admin reporting with graphs, charts and more.

products.title: User Registration
products.name: Everest Forms User Registration
products.excerpt: Allows you to create a custom WordPress user registration form instantly in few simple steps. You can add or remove input fields as per the style of your registration using this feature.

products.title: Post Submissions
products.name: Everest Forms Post Submissions
products.excerpt: Allows you to have user generated content. Users to submit their blogs, posts or contents e.t.c. from front-end without the hassle of logging into the admin dashboard.

products.title: Zapier
products.name: Everest Forms Zapier
products.excerpt: Allows you to easily connect your Everest forms with over 1500+ popular web applications hassle free. Zapier addon makes it butter-smooth integrating forms and apps.
